sentences.en: Both extort large sums of money from mines they control.
sentences.cn: 他们从控制的矿企业中勒索大笔资金.

sentences.en: Corrupt government officials were extorting money from him.
sentences.cn: 腐败的政府官员那时正向他勒索钱财。

sentences.en: Criminal groups have used such information to extort sensitive information from employees in the past.
sentences.cn: 犯罪组织过去利用此类信息向有关员工勒索敏感信息.

sentences.en: He is a merchant; In his hand are balances of deceit ; He loves to extort.
sentences.cn: 7以法莲是商人, 手里有诡诈的天平, 喜爱欺诈.

sentences.en: How valuable is a confession extorted under such circumstances? Why does Michael extort it?
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下,忏悔有什么价值? 为什么Michael要他忏悔?

sentences.en: The blackmailer tried to extort a large sum of money from him.
sentences.cn: 勒索者企图向他勒索一大笔钱.

sentences.en: The police used torture to extort a confession from him.
The police used torture to extort a confession from me.
They go to any length to extort wealth and want to become rich by any means.
sentences.cn: 无所不用其极地搜刮财物,不择手段地想成为富人.
